mapper.select: ( SELECT tr.track_id AS id, t.title AS name, tr.content, tr.rating, tr.created_at AS createdAt, 'TRACK' AS type FROM ( SELECT * FROM track_review tr1 WHERE tr1.id = ( SELECT tr2.id FROM track_review tr2 WHERE tr2.track_id = tr1.track_id ORDER BY tr2.created_at DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) tr JOIN track t ON tr.track_id = t.id WHERE t.artist_id = #{artistId} ) UNION ALL ( SELECT ar.album_id AS id, a.title AS name, ar.content, ar.rating, ar.created_at AS createdAt, 'ALBUM' AS type FROM ( SELECT * FROM album_review ar1 WHERE ar1.id = ( SELECT ar2.id FROM album_review ar2 WHERE ar2.album_id = ar1.album_id ORDER BY ar2.created_at DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) ar JOIN album a ON ar.album_id = a.id WHERE a.artist_id = #{artistId} ) ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 8
